poems.title: Always Stay
poems.alt: A sunset representing the poem Searching For Hope
poems.content: Stay in My corner /nI need you with Me /nI want you always /nI made you for Me /nStay in My corner /nYou are My joy /nI want you always /nYou are My pleasure /nStay in My corner /nWe know love /nI want you always /nWe belong together /nYou and Me forever /nStay in My corner

poems.title: Me In Disguise
poems.alt: A comet in the sky representing the poem Me In Disguise
poems.content:
My broken heart's never going to be healed 
It fought and lost once before 
Begged for a second chance, but not anymore 
Since then it's learned to close the door

Why hold on to a love that's no longer there 
She ain't going to love me anymore and I'm aware

So I walked into her room 
But I was disguised 
She thinks we've been apart for a while 
But I was there the whole time

It's true it's me in disguise 
I came to fulfil my last promise 
Hoping to solve this crisis
